name: All substrates must be structurally sound, dry, solid, and stable. Any laitance, dust, grease, oil, paint, release agent or curing compounds present on the surface of the above listed substrates that may inhibit bond must be mechanically removed. The substrates should then be cleaned and prepared in accordance with the relevant standards
PVC Sheet Membrane Detailing as required
Test 2 Air Test Pass/Fail (if double seam weld is done otherwise revert to test 1)
Final Walk over and inspection by main contractor, Supplier and Applicator if Applicable
Substrate inspected and accepted. Substrate must be clean, smooth, dry and free from dust or contaminants. All sharp points and loose material to be removed.
Final Walk over and inspection by main contractor, Supplier and Applicator if Applicable
